I agree to all the rules, except i have a question about one of them...
In the case of a tie between scores, you said that you will settle it with 
one of the following, and you list 7 things.  Is that the order that the ties 
will be broken?  For example, there's a tie between two players, so they play 
a tie-breaker scneario then if they tie there whomever doesn't have a cleric, 
then if neither do, then whomever has a ghost, etc.

Lates,
Tristan
